name: TX CONTACT 600-039
description: This LoRaWAN Open/Closed contact sensor allows you to detect and report status changes on a dry-contact or open collector interface. The digital input sensor can manage two inputs simultaneously. Here are examples of applications covered by our LoRaWAN contact sensor: monitoring of door openings and closures, detection of system failures, any application requiring the detection of a status change
author: Akenza AG
